docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs develop For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Project requirement mkdocs ( pip3 install mkdocs ) material theme ( pip3 install mkdocs-material ) mike ( pip3 install mike ) For installation: pip install -r requirements.txt
